Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Olive Oil
Flank Steak
3 Garlic Cloves
4 Green Onions and wash
Shallot and wash
Broccoli
Arrow Root Starchs
Water
Aminos Coconut
Ground Ginger and wash
Red Pepper Flakes and wash

Vegan Recipe

Put 1 tbsp Olive Oil on pan on heat 5
Cut ½ pound Flank Steak into strips
Wait 6 minutes Cook beef
Put beef in pyrex bowl
Put 4 Green Onions , 3 Garlic Cloves , Shallot in same pan.
Wait 1 minute Cook
Add Broccoli in same pan with cover.
Wait 5 minutes Cook
In a bowl mix 2 tbsps Arrow Root Starchs , ¾ cup Water , ¼ cup Aminos Coconut , 1 tsp Ground Ginger , 1 tsp Red Pepper Flakes
Wait 5 minutes Once broccoli is done, remove cover and add sauce. Continue cooking.
Wait 2 minutes Add beef and finish cooking.
